title: Job Openings at Transsion Holdings
content:
Transsion Holdings, the company formerly known as TECNO TELECOM LIMITED, established in July 2006, is a high-tech company specializing in the R&D, production, sale and service of mobile communication products. After years of development, Transsion has become an important part of the mobile phone industry and one of the major mobile phone manufacturers in the world. Currently, it has full ownership of three famous mobile phone brands TECNO, itel and Infinix, and an after-sales service brand Carlcare.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Data Analyst

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Coordinate data gathering activities from all states within the assigned region.
	Analyse collected data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for operational improvement.
	Ensure accuracy, consistency, and timeliness in regional data reporting.
	Collaborate with field teams to resolve data inconsistencies and optimize reporting structures.
	Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related field.
	Develop and propose data-driven recommendations for the efficient execution of regional initiatives.
	Generate and communicate relevant statistics and insights for use by senior management.
	Support the implementation and monitoring of data inputs for Finance(FOL) applications.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including advanced functions and data analysis tools.
	Ability to present findings using reports, visuals, and dashboards.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience. 


Application Closing Date: 1st August, 2025. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: oyeleke.adebimpe@transsion.com using " Application - Data Analyst (port Harcourt)" as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Tax Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for an experiencedTax Managerto lead and manage multiple operations of the tax practice area and to deliver quality tax services, that will increase our firm’s reputation.


Responsibilities


	?Deliver a full range of tax services in compliance with laws and regulations within timeframe
	Build relationships and interact with clients to provide excellent planning, consulting and expertise
	Provide innovative tax planning and review complex income tax returns
	Identify and mitigate tax risks
	Coordinate accounting staff and assess their performance
	Manage tax provision and tax compliance process
	Improve processes by developing or implementing best practices
	Manage and coordinate tax audits
	Maintain tax balances on general ledger
	Prepare all tax papers in a regular basis and handle all information data requests


Requirements


	BA in Accounting or MA in Taxation
	Proven work experience as a Tax Manager
	Excellent knowledge of tax accounting, tax compliance and all types of tax returns
	Knowledge of tax software and MS Office
	Good at meeting deadlines and solving problems
	Exceptional client service along with the ability to develop excellent client relationships
	Strong leadership and personnel management skills
	Analytical skills with detail orientation.


Application Closing Date: 7th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: oyeleke.adebimpe@transsion.com using " Tax manager" as the subject of the mail.


3.) Financial Specialist / Analyst

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities
Rebate Policy Process Management:


	Manage the application, review, and optimization of business rebate policies, ensuring compliance with company financial standards and regulations.
	Collaborate with sales and business teams to review rebate applications, complete internal approvals, and ensure accurate system entries.


Rebate Execution & Accounting:


	Monitor rebate fulfillment, regularly verify rebate data for clients/channels, and ensure accuracy.
	Handle rebate accruals, write-offs, and financial postings, supporting month-end/quarter-end closing with the finance team.


Rebate Effectiveness Analysis:


	Develop rebate ROI models to evaluate the impact of rebate policies on business growth.
	Generate rebate performance reports, identify anomalies, and provide optimization recommendations to support management decisions.


System & Data Management:


	Maintain rebate databases and improve accounting tools (e.g., Excel/ERP/BI systems) to enhance automation.


Qualifications
Professional Background:


	Bachelor’s Degree or above in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related fields; CPA/CMA preferred.
	3+ years of financial analysis or accounting experience, preferably in rebate management/channel incentive accounting.


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in Excel (Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP, etc.), ERP systems; Power BI/SQL is a plus.
	Solid knowledge of accounting principles and strong analytical skills with attention to detail.


Soft Skills:


	Strong communication and coordination skills to drive cross-departmental collaboration.
	Results-driven, capable of independently managing complex data analysis and reporting.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Familiarity with rebate models in industries such retail, or e-commerce.
	Experience in building rebate management systems from scratch.


Application Closing Date: 9th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: adebayo.adetutu@itel-mobile.com using "Financial Specialist / Financial Analyst"as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Back End Developer",
  "description": "Kredete is a financial technology platform designed to help African immigrants build credit and send money instantly to over 30+ African countries. Using stablecoins and modern payment systems, we make it easy and affordable for businesses to move money across borders. Our mission is to provide accessible, secure, and low-cost financial solutions that improve cash flow and support financial growth for individuals and businesses.&nbsp;&nbsp;With Kredete, we&#39;re connecting people and communities to better financial opportunities globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Back End Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a talented and high impact Backend Engineer to drive our growth, he/she will be responsible for the you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend systems that power our applications.


What You Will Do


	Design and implement RESTful APIs
	Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
	Implement security and data protection measures
	Write clean, maintainable code and conduct thorough code reviews. Troubleshoot and debug issues
	Investigate defect reports from products, isolate their causes, inform development teams for fixing and retest to ensure adequate resolutions.
	Profound knowledge of MongoDB &amp; mongoose ODM (SQL &amp; PostgreSQL a plus)
	Ability to understand specifications and API requirements
	Understanding of asynchronous programming and event-driven architecture
	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
	Excellent communication, attention to detail and collaboration abilities
	Provide root cause analysis and solve all user issues on the backend
	Ability to make sound decisions quickly and efficiently.
	Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices


Requirements
Who You Are:


	Proficiency in NestJS &amp; Typescript
	5 Years of Experience as a backend engineer in the Fintech space
	Profound knowledge of MongoDB &amp; mongoose ODM (SQL &amp; PostgreSQL a plus)
	Ability to understand specifications and API requirements
	Understanding of asynchronous programming and event-driven architecture
	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
	Work cross-functionally with Product, Design, Support etc.
	Familiarity with ticketing (Intercom, Freshdesk) systems and JIRA
	Technical exposure in any of these will be a plus to be successful in the role &ndash; API Development and testing, Working with Web Services, Programming languages like Java, JavaScript, API Integration.
	Excellent communications, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
	Humble, hardworking and ambitious.


What We Offer


	Rewarding Pay
	Team bonuses and office-based perks
	Premium HMO Plan
	Professional development and an opportunity to work with a team that is changing the financial future of Africa and immigrants globally.

Back End Developer Job at Kredete




        
    

        
        Kredete is a financial technology platform designed to help African immigrants build credit and send money instantly to over 30+ African countries. Using stablecoins and modern payment systems, we make it easy and affordable for businesses to move money across borders. Our mission is to provide accessible, secure, and low-cost financial solutions that improve cash flow and support financial growth for individuals and businesses.  With Kredete, we're connecting people and communities to better financial opportunities globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Back End Developer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a talented and high impact Backend Engineer to drive our growth, he/she will be responsible for the you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend systems that power our applications.


What You Will Do


	Design and implement RESTful APIs
	Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
	Implement security and data protection measures
	Write clean, maintainable code and conduct thorough code reviews. Troubleshoot and debug issues
	Investigate defect reports from products, isolate their causes, inform development teams for fixing and retest to ensure adequate resolutions.
	Profound knowledge of MongoDB & mongoose ODM (SQL & PostgreSQL a plus)
	Ability to understand specifications and API requirements
	Understanding of asynchronous programming and event-driven architecture
	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
	Excellent communication, attention to detail and collaboration abilities
	Provide root cause analysis and solve all user issues on the backend
	Ability to make sound decisions quickly and efficiently.
	Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices


Requirements
Who You Are:


	Proficiency in NestJS & Typescript
	5 Years of Experience as a backend engineer in the Fintech space
	Profound knowledge of MongoDB & mongoose ODM (SQL & PostgreSQL a plus)
	Ability to understand specifications and API requirements
	Understanding of asynchronous programming and event-driven architecture
	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
	Work cross-functionally with Product, Design, Support etc.
	Familiarity with ticketing (Intercom, Freshdesk) systems and JIRA
	Technical exposure in any of these will be a plus to be successful in the role – API Development and testing, Working with Web Services, Programming languages like Java, JavaScript, API Integration.
	Excellent communications, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
	Humble, hardworking and ambitious.


What We Offer


	Rewarding Pay
	Team bonuses and office-based perks
	Premium HMO Plan
	Professional development and an opportunity to work with a team that is changing the financial future of Africa and immigrants globally.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are a diversified and internationally recognized energy company that provides stable and reliable power to all customers by generation and distribution of power while maintaining stringent adherence to OEM guidelines of operation and maintenance. Apart from power generation and distribution, we can also provide EPC and maintenance services for substations, transmission line and pressure reducing &amp; measuring stations. At Paras Energy, we believe that electricity should be accessible and affordable to all. Over the years, we have gathered a diverse clientele all over Nigeria and we continue to grow our portfolio through the provision of reliable services. On 8th April 2016, Paras Energy became the 27th Company to supply power to National Grid in Nigeria and the first privately owned company to supply power under a bilateral agreement to their customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Payroll Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements

	Minimum 5 years of hands-on payroll experience, preferably in manufacturing, factory, or FMCG environments with large workforces (200+ employees).
	Proven track record of processing factory payrolls (shift workers, overtime, allowances, bonuses).
	Familiarity with Nigerian payroll regulations

Payroll Officer Job at Paras Energy




        
    

        
        
     

            
    

Paras Energy was incorporated in the year 2002. We are a diversified and internationally recognized energy company that provides stable and reliable power to all customers by generation and distribution of power while maintaining stringent adherence to OEM guidelines of operation and maintenance. Apart from power generation and distribution, we can also provide EPC and maintenance services for substations, transmission line and pressure reducing & measuring stations. At Paras Energy, we believe that electricity should be accessible and affordable to all. Over the years, we have gathered a diverse clientele all over Nigeria and we continue to grow our portfolio through the provision of reliable services. On 8th April 2016, Paras Energy became the 27th Company to supply power to National Grid in Nigeria and the first privately owned company to supply power under a bilateral agreement to their customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Payroll Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	HND / B.Sc in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or related fields
	Minimum 5 years of hands-on payroll experience, preferably in manufacturing, factory, or FMCG environments with large workforces (200+ employees).
	Proven track record of processing factory payrolls (shift workers, overtime, allowances, bonuses).
	Familiarity with Nigerian payroll regulations
	Experience with timesheet management (manual/electronic) for factory workers
	Advanced Excel skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@Parasenergy.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only candidates available for physical interview should    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Web App Developer with UI/UX",
  "description": "Mitiget is a leading Enterprise Information Security company delivering comprehensive security, safety and compliance solutions. Our solutions are the most competitively priced to a myriad of industry verticals, empowering enterprises to achieve a business enabled defense-in-depth security posture, manage corporate risk, improve compliance, and attain proactive detection and prevention of security threats to their people, processes, computing infrastructure including data, and applications.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Web App Developer with UI/UX
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a versatile and experienced Web App Developer to join our team, specializing in creating dynamic, user-centric web applications.
	This role requires a unique blend of UI/UX design sensibility, robust WordPress development, and cutting-edge React frontend expertise.


Core Technical Expertise
React.js (Expert):


	Mastery of Hooks, component architecture, and performance optimization.
	Strong experience with state management (e.g., Redux Toolkit, Zustand) and data fetching (e.g., React Query).
	Proficient in building reusable and scalable React components.


UI/UX Design &amp; Implementation:


	Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, information architecture, and usability best practices.
	Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and translating design mockups into functional, pixel-perfect interfaces.
	Proficiency in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences.


WordPress Development (Advanced):


	Extensive experience with custom theme and plugin development.
	Strong knowledge of WordPress REST API for headless or decoupled architectures.
	Ability to integrate React frontends with WordPress backends seamlessly.
	Understanding of WordPress security and performance optimization.


Frontend Fundamentals:


	Expertise in modern HTML5, CSS3 (including Flexbox, Grid, responsive design), and JavaScript (ES6+).
	Experience with CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS or similar for efficient styling.
	Mandatory proficiency in TypeScript for robust and maintainable code.


Testing &amp; Quality:


	
	Experience with unit, integration, and end-to-end testing methodologies (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress).
	


Integration &amp; Professional Acumen:


	Proven ability to integrate diverse technologies (React, WordPress API) to build cohesive web applications.
	Strong understanding of web performance optimization, accessibility (A11y), and security best practices.
	Experience with version control (Git) and collaborative development workflows in an Agile environment.
	Capable of translating complex business requirements into technical solutions and user-friendly designs.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 3 - 10 years of work experience.&nbsp;


Soft Skills:


	Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration abilities, working effectively with designers, backend developers, and stakeholders.
	A keen eye for detail and a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@mitiget.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Web App Developer with UI/UX Job at Mitiget




        
    

        
        Mitiget is a leading Enterprise Information Security company delivering comprehensive security, safety and compliance solutions. Our solutions are the most competitively priced to a myriad of industry verticals, empowering enterprises to achieve a business enabled defense-in-depth security posture, manage corporate risk, improve compliance, and attain proactive detection and prevention of security threats to their people, processes, computing infrastructure including data, and applications.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Web App Developer with UI/UX
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a versatile and experienced Web App Developer to join our team, specializing in creating dynamic, user-centric web applications.
	This role requires a unique blend of UI/UX design sensibility, robust WordPress development, and cutting-edge React frontend expertise.


Core Technical Expertise
React.js (Expert):


	Mastery of Hooks, component architecture, and performance optimization.
	Strong experience with state management (e.g., Redux Toolkit, Zustand) and data fetching (e.g., React Query).
	Proficient in building reusable and scalable React components.


UI/UX Design & Implementation:


	Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, information architecture, and usability best practices.
	Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and translating design mockups into functional, pixel-perfect interfaces.
	Proficiency in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences.


WordPress Development (Advanced):


	Extensive experience with custom theme and plugin development.
	Strong knowledge of WordPress REST API for headless or decoupled architectures.
	Ability to integrate React frontends with WordPress backends seamlessly.
	Understanding of WordPress security and performance optimization.


Frontend Fundamentals:


	Expertise in modern HTML5, CSS3 (including Flexbox, Grid, responsive design), and JavaScript (ES6+).
	Experience with CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS or similar for efficient styling.
	Mandatory proficiency in TypeScript for robust and maintainable code.


Testing & Quality:


	
	Experience with unit, integration, and end-to-end testing methodologies (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress).
	


Integration & Professional Acumen:


	Proven ability to integrate diverse technologies (React, WordPress API) to build cohesive web applications.
	Strong understanding of web performance optimization, accessibility (A11y), and security best practices.
	Experience with version control (Git) and collaborative development workflows in an Agile environment.
	Capable of translating complex business requirements into technical solutions and user-friendly designs.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 3 - 10 years of work experience. 


Soft Skills:


	Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration abilities, working effectively with designers, backend developers, and stakeholders.
	A keen eye for detail and a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@mitiget.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
